item.title: ニュース共有アプリArtifactは、ユーザーがライターをフォローして投稿時に通知を受けることができるようになり、ライターは自分のプロフィールを主張して検証済みのチェックマークを取得できるようになった（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
News sharing app Artifact now lets users follow writers and get notifications when they post, and writers can claim their profiles to get a verified checkmark  —  Artifact, the AI-powered news app from Instagram co-founders Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger, has a new feature that makes it even more of a news-focused social media app.

item.title: ソニーの信仰に基づく月額8ドルのストリーミングサービスPure Flixは、米国とカナダで〜100万人の加入者を抱えているが、ホールマークのライバルGreat American Mediaと合併する予定だ（Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
item.description:
Lillian Rizzo / CNBC:
Sony's faith-based $8/month streaming service Pure Flix, which has ~1M subscribers in the US and Canada, plans to merge with Hallmark rival Great American Media  —  - Sony's Pure Flix, a faith-based streaming service, will merge with Great American Media, the owner of two cable networks.

item.title: The Guardian、The Times、The Economist、Financial Times、Tortoiseが、AcastがコーディネートするPublishers in Podcasting consortiumを結成し、ベストプラクティスを共有（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The Guardian, The Times, The Economist, Financial Times, and Tortoise form the Publishers in Podcasting consortium coordinated by Acast, to share best practices  —  The five publishers will share expertise and best practice in a new consortium set up by Acast.

item.title: ワシントン・ポストは、2022年に退社してアスレチックに入社したスティーブン・ギンズバーグの後任として、マテア・ゴールドを編集長に指名、ゴールドは2013年にポスト入りした（Elahe Izadi/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Elahe Izadi / Washington Post:
The Washington Post names Matea Gold as a managing editor, replacing Steven Ginsberg, who left in 2022 to join The Athletic; Gold joined The Post in 2013  —  Matea Gold will become a managing editor of The Washington Post, executive editor Sally Buzbee announced Thursday.

item.title: BBCの委員会は、リチャード・シャープが会長在任中の利益相反の可能性を排除したが、「在任当初に宣言」すべきだったとしている（Max Goldbart/Deadline)
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
A BBC committee clears Richard Sharp of potential conflicts of interest while he was chairman but says he should've made “declarations at the outset his tenure”  —  The BBC has cleared the resigning Richard Sharp of any potential conflict of interest issues arising during his time as Chairman.

item.title: The Athleticのライター主催のライブルームの様子。ビートレポーターが試合後に購読者と会話をするための双方向の音声プラットフォームとして機能する（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
A look at The Athletic's writer-hosted live rooms, which serve as a two-way audio platform for beat reporters to have postgame conversations with subscribers  —  The Athletic's first live room took place in September 2021.  By January 2022, they'd done 100.  Today, they're closing in on 1,000.

item.title: ITV、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比7%減の£776M、ITV Studiosの売上高は横ばいの£457M、総広告収入は前年同期比10%減、デジタル広告収入は同30%増の£87M (Naman Ramachandran/Variety)
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
ITV reports Q1 revenue down 7% YoY to £776M, ITV Studios revenue flat at £457M, total ad revenue down 10% YoY, and digital ad revenue up 30% YoY to £87M  —  U.K. broadcasting giant ITV's revenues dipped in the first quarter of 2023, but streamer ITVX has seen a growth uptick, according to figures released on Thursday.
